title: What does commuting a sentence mean? Biden's latest move, explained
shortDescription: President Joe Biden announced he would commute the sentences of 37 individuals on federal death row. Here's what that means.

title: Trump wants to control Greenland, declaring it an "absolute necessity"
shortDescription: Trump renews interest in U.S. control over Greenland, but the Prime Minister rejects the idea, saying the island is not for sale.

title: Matt Gaetz report: Read the House Ethics Committee's full report
shortDescription: Read the entire House Ethics Committee report, including four appendices with additional exhibits and transcripts.

title: As President Biden's term nears end, how do people ask for pardons?
shortDescription: As President Biden's term ends, here are the variety of ways people seek pardons to wipe away criminal charges or convictions.

title: Biden commutes most federal death row sentences
shortDescription: President Joe Biden commuted 37 out of 40 federal death row sentences before President-elect Donald Trump takes office.

title: Trump responds to ‘President Musk’ comments
shortDescription: Donald Trump dismissed recent comments that his ally Elon Musk might be the "real president."

title: Biden commutes all but 3 men on federal death row: Who are they?
shortDescription: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, Robert Bowers and Dylann Roof were the only three prisoners on federal death row whose sentences were not commuted Monday.

title: President Biden commutes sentences of 37 death row inmates
shortDescription: President Joe Biden has commuted the sentences of 37 federal death row inmates, converting their punishment to life imprisonment without parole.

title: Biden commutes sentences of 37 people on death row: See full list of names
shortDescription: President Joe Biden on Monday commuted the sentences of 37 individuals on death row, the White House announced. See the full list of names.

title: Biden commutes sentences of most federal death row inmates
shortDescription: President Joe Biden commuted the sentences of all but three inmates on federal death row to life in prison without the possibility of parole.

title: Trump State Dept pick blasted immigration by 'Jose' and 'Muhammed'
shortDescription: Michael Anton, Trump’s pick for policy director at the State Department, wrote a 2016 essay criticizing racial diversity, Muslims and immigration.

title: 'They ruin your look': Trump vows to launch anti-drug ad campaign
shortDescription: "We're going to advertise how bad drugs are for you. They ruin your look," President-elect Donald Trump said at a conference in Arizona.

title: Trump vows to rename Denali, North America's tallest mountain, as Mt McKinley
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he will rename Denali, Alaska natives' name for North America's tallest mountain, after William McKinley, the 25th U.S. president.

title: Trump lashes out at Panama, says he might demand the country hand over canal
shortDescription: Trump accused Panama of charging excessive rates for use of the Panama Canal and said that if Panama did not manage the canal in an acceptable fashion, he would demand the hand it over.

title: What's ahead for Democrats with Trump's return? 5 takeaways
shortDescription: With no president or congressional majority and Trump's return imminent, Democrats are hurrying for a 2025 reboot.

title: Lara Trump removes her name from consideration to replace Marco Rubio
shortDescription: Lara Trump has decided to remove her name from consideration to be a senator in Florida replacing outgoing senator Marco Rubio.

title: Trump: 'Apprentice' producer Burnett to be UK special envoy
shortDescription: Reality TV producer Mark Burnett ('The Apprentice," "The Voice," and "Survivor") was named the UK special envoy by President-elect Donald Trump.

title: Trump ally Elon Musk backs far-right German political party
shortDescription: The tech billionaire who has already made a name in American politics offered his endorsement following a deadly German Christmas market attack.

title: Republicans, Democrats play blame game over dodged shutdown
shortDescription: Democrats and Republicans traded barbs and tried to evade blame, after Trump and Musk killed a bipartisan deal and threatened government shutdown.

title: Congress passes bipartisan bill to fund government
shortDescription: Congress passed a short-term plan to keep the government’s doors open until President-elect Donald Trump takes office.

title: Trump at McDonald's, 'kamala IS brat': Most viral political moments of 2024
shortDescription: It was a wild year in politics. Here were the internet's favorite moments from the presidential debate, to Donald Trump at McDonald's and 'brat.'

title: Congress approves change to Social Security for teachers, firefighters
shortDescription: The legislation will now go to President Joe Biden's desk and is expected to be signed into law.

title: Biden signs bipartisan funding deal, ending shutdown standoff
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump and multibillionaire Elon Musk had sunk an earlier bipartisan deal, only to see their preferred replacement voted down.

title: Biden abandons student debt relief proposals he lauded
shortDescription: The Education Department said it "intends to commit its limited operational resources to helping at-risk borrowers return to repayment successfully."
